name: Finest Honey Roast Ham
description:
Please note that this item will be ready for delivery after two days from order placement due to the special preparation process. Therefore, we kindly request you to select your delivery date accordingly. Thank you!

Minimum delivery weight 3kg

This cured ham is specially made from selected cuts of pork leg and glazed with honey and then roasted. The roasted honey gives it a delicious caramelized finish.
